text: Kamen Rider Fourze is a Japanese tokusatsu drama in Toei Company's Kamen Rider Series. ==Schedule== Super Hero Time aired alongside Kaizoku Sentai Gokaiger and then Tokumei Sentai Go-Busters. ==Cast== * Gentaro Kisaragi / Kamen Rider Fourze: Sota Fukushi * Kengo Utahoshi: Ryuki Takahashi * Yuki Jojima: Fumika Shimizu * Miu Kazashiro: Rikako Sakata * Shun Daimonji: Justin Tomimori * Tomoko Nozama: Shiho * JK: Shion Tsuchiya * Ryusei Sakuta / Kamen Rider Meteor: Ryo Yoshizawa * Sarina Sonada: Yuka Konan * Chuta Otsugi: Takushi Tanaka (Ungirls) * Mitsuaki Gomou: Shingo Tsurumi * Kouhei Hayami: Kousei Amano * Natsuji Kijima: Soran Tamoto * Kou Tatsugami: Kazutoshi Yokoyama * Kuniteru Emoto: Hajime Yamazaki * Narration, Tachibana (Voice): Nobuyuki Hiyama ===Guest cast=== * Toshiya Miura (1, 2, 13, 14): Masanori Mizuno * Tsuyoshi Satake (7, 8, 48): Satoshi Jinbo * Takato Daimonji (7, 8): Ryo Kamon * Soushi Matoyama (15, 16): Ryutarou Akimoto * Junta Abe (15, 16): Tokimasa Tanabe * Jin Nomoto (19, 20): Ryu Ando * Haruka Utsugi (21, 22, 48): Nao Nagasawa * Man at kick boxing gym (21, 22): Koji Nakamura * Ran Kuroki (29, 30, 45, 46, 48): Rin Honoka * Haru Kusao (29, 30. 45, 46, 48): Jigen Araki * Yayoi Tokuda (25, 26): Kasumi Suzuki * Mei Shirakawa (30-32): Runa Natsui * Yuki's father: Yuu Kamio * Haruto Soma / Kamen Rider Wizard (48): Shunya Shiraishi ===Space, Here We Come! cast=== * Taneo Komatsu: Yoshiaki Yamane (Ungirls) ===Movie War Ultimatum cast=== * Nadeshiko Misaki / Kamen Rider Nadeshiko: Erina Mano * Inga Blink: Mikie Hara * Miyoko Ohki: Rika Adachi * Saburo Kazeta: Kenta Suga * Rumi Komaki: Kasumi Yamaya * Daita Kondo: Kazuyoshi Nakazawa * Chikao Nezu: Yuya Hara * Kageto Banba: Toshiya Toyama * Yu Kamimura: Mari Ikiri * Young Saburo: Itsuki Shibuya * Young Rumi: Shiori Haga * Young Daita: Taiga Sakamoto * Young Chikao: Hidetoshi Akutsu ==Songs== ; Opening theme * "Switch On!" ** Lyrics: Shoko Fujibayashi ** Composition & Arrangement: tatsuo (of everset) ** Artist: Anna Tsuchiya ; Insert themes * "Giant Step" ** Lyrics: Shoko Fujibayashi ** Composition & Arrangement: Shuhei Naruse ** Artist: Astronauts (May'n & Yoshiharu Shiina) ** Episodes: 6-16, 18, 19, 23-25 * "Shooting Star" ** Lyrics: Shoko Fujibayashi ** Composition & Arrangement: tatsuo (of everset) ** Artist: everset ** Episodes: 16-18, 21, 22, 26, 29 * "Bounce Back" ** Lyrics: Shoko Fujibayashi ** Composition & Arrangement: Kosuke Yamashita ** Artist: Southern (Minami Kuribayashi & Kosuke Yamashita) ** Episodes: 20-22, 31 * "ENDLESS PLAY" ** Lyrics: Shoko Fujibayashi ** Composition: TAKUYA ** Arrangement: Keisuke Iizuka, TAKUYA ** Artist: Astronauts feat. SHIINA (Yoshiharu Shiina) ** Episodes: 21, 29, 48 * "Evolvin' Storm" ** Lyrics: Shoko Fujibayashi ** Composition & Arrangement: tatsuo (of everset) ** Artist: everset ** Episodes: 28-30, 36 * "COSMIC MIND" ** Lyrics: Shoko Fujibayashi ** Composition & Arrangement: Shuhei Naruse ** Artist: Astronauts (May'n & Yoshiharu Shiina) ** Episodes: 32-35, 37, 40-46, 48 ; Other songs * "Ganbare, Hayabusa-kun" ("Go, Hayabusa") ** Artist: Yuki Jojima (Fumika Shimizu) ** Episodes: 3, 5, 16 * "Saite" ("Blooming") ** Lyrics: Tsuyoshi Himura & Tenji Nagano ** Composition: Tenji Nagano ** Arrangement: Shuhei Naruse ** Artist: Kamen Rider Girls ** Episodes: 26, 48 * "Hayabusa Metal" ** Artist: Kamen Rider Club Band ** Episodes: 35 * "Love is Overdrive" ** Lyrics: Shoko Fujibayashi ** Composition: DJ HURRY KENN ** Arrangement: AYANO (of FULL AHEAD) ** Artist: JK (Shion Tsuchiya) ** Episodes: 35, 36 * "Oyaji no Blues" ("Father Blues") ** Lyrics: Shoko Fujibayashi ** Composition: DJ HURRY KENN ** Arrangement: AYANO (of FULL AHEAD) ** Artist: JK (Shion Tsuchiya) ** Episodes: 36 Category:Japanese science fiction television series Category:2011 Japanese television series debuts Category:2012 Japanese television series endings
title: Kamen Rider Fourze
